= TPJAboutBoxDlg =

*Project:* [AboutBoxComponent About Box Component].

*Unit:* _PJAbout_.

This non-visual component encapsulates an About Box in a non-visual component. It is displayed by calling its _[TPJAboutBoxDlgExecute Execute]_ method. It has string properties to display five different pieces of information in the about box. They are: _[TPJAboutBoxDlgCopyright Copyright]_, _[TPJAboutBoxDlgNotes DlgNotes]_, _[TPJAboutBoxDlgProgramName ProgramName]_, _[TPJAboutBoxDlgTitle Title]_ and _[TPJAboutBoxDlgVersion Version]_.

Alternatively, the about box can display information from a _VERSIONINFO_ resource included in a program file. This is achieved by setting the _[TPJAboutBoxDlgVersionInfo VersionInfo]_ property to reference a _[TPJVersionInfo TPJVersionInfo]_ component which extracts the required version information from an executable file.

The application's icon is displayed in the dialog box. This is the icon specified by the _Icon_ property of the _TApplication_ object. If no icon has been specified for the application then default Delphi icon is used.

Other properties are used to position of the about box on the screen and control the position and appearance of the dialog's _Close_ button.

The _[TPJAboutBoxDlgHelpContext HelpContext]_ property allows Windows Help to be displayed for the dialog box when the F1 key is pressed.

== Methods ==

|| * Method* || *Description* ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgExecute Execute]_ || Displays the about box. ||

== Properties ==

|| *Property* || *Description* ||
|| _!AutoDetectGlyphs_ || *Removed in v3.6*<br>Determines whether the display of glyphs depends on the _!ButtonGlyph_ property or depends on the default compiler settings.<br>_This property was deprecated in v3.5._ ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgButtonGlyph ButtonGlyph]_ || Determines which, if any, glyph is displayed on the dialog's close button. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgButtonHeight ButtonHeight]_ || Specifies the height of the dialog's close button. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgButtonKind ButtonKind]_ || Determines the text displayed on the dialog's close button. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgButtonPlacing ButtonPlacing]_ || Determines the horizontal alignment of the dialog's close button. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgButtonWidth ButtonWidth]_ || Specifies the width of the dialog's close button. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgCentreDlg CentreDlg]_ || Determines whether or not the dialog box is centred on screen. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgCopyright Copyright]_ || The copyright message displayed in the about box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgDlgLeft DlgLeft]_ || Specifies the location of the left hand side of the about box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgDlgTop DlgTop]_ || Specifies the location of the top of the about box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgFont Font]_ || Specifies the font used in the dialog box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgHelpContext HelpContext]_ || Stores the help topic number accessed when F1 is pressed. A zero value is ignored. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgNotes Notes]_ || Notes displayed in the dialog box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgPosition Position]_ || Determines whether the about box is positioned relative to screen, desktop or owner form. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgProgramName ProgramName]_ || Name of the program displayed in the about box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgTitle Title]_ || Text displayed in the caption of the dialog box window. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgUseOSStdFonts UseOSStdFonts]_ || Specifies whether the dialog box should use the system's default font. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgUseOwnerAsParent UseOwnerAsParent]_ || Determines if the dialog box should to be forced to be a child window of any owning control. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgVersion Version]_ || The version number information to be displayed in the dialog box. ||
|| _[TPJAboutBoxDlgVersionInfo VersionInfo]_ || Reference to any _[TPJVersionInfo TPJVersionInfo]_ component that provides the text displayed in the about box. ||

== Events ==

_TPJAboutBoxDlg_ defines no events.
